model_answer: The correct answer is C: [00:02:54 - 00:03:05]. The narrator explains that speechlessness may be due to an endotracheal tube and advises recording "verbal not testable" in this segment, along with showing a patient with a nasal cannula and an overlaid Glasgow Coma Scale chart.
The video shows the "10 SEC" timer at [00:04:07 - 00:05:12]. Answer: A
